cobol_file.content:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. AOC-2020-02-2.
       AUTHOR. ANNA KOSIERADZKA.
      
       ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
       INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION.
       FILE-CONTROL.
           SELECT INPUTFILE ASSIGN TO "d2.input"
           ORGANIZATION IS LINE SEQUENTIAL.
           
       DATA DIVISION.
       FILE SECTION.
         FD INPUTFILE
         RECORD IS VARYING IN SIZE FROM 8 to 50
         DEPENDING ON REC-LEN.
         01 INPUTRECORD PIC X(50).
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
         01 FILE-STATUS PIC 9 VALUE 0.
         01 REC-LEN  PIC 9(2) COMP.
         01 WS-POS-1 PIC 9(4).
         01 WS-POS-2 PIC 9(4).
         01 WS-CHAR PIC A.
         01 WS-STRING-EMPTY PIC X.
         01 WS-PASSWORD PIC A(50).

       LOCAL-STORAGE SECTION.
         01 CONDITIONS-MET UNSIGNED-INT VALUE 0.
         01 CORRECT-ROWS UNSIGNED-INT VALUE 0.

       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       001-MAIN.
            OPEN INPUT INPUTFILE.
            PERFORM 002-READ UNTIL FILE-STATUS = 1.
            CLOSE INPUTFILE.
            DISPLAY CORRECT-ROWS.
            STOP RUN.

       002-READ.
            READ INPUTFILE
                AT END MOVE 1 TO FILE-STATUS
                NOT AT END PERFORM 003-PROCESS-RECORD
            END-READ.
       
       003-PROCESS-RECORD.
           MOVE 0 TO CONDITIONS-MET.
           UNSTRING INPUTRECORD DELIMITED BY SPACE OR "-" OR ":" INTO 
               WS-POS-1
               WS-POS-2
               WS-CHAR
               WS-STRING-EMPTY
               WS-PASSWORD.
           IF WS-PASSWORD(WS-POS-1:1) = WS-CHAR THEN
              ADD 1 TO CONDITIONS-MET
           END-IF.
           IF WS-PASSWORD(WS-POS-2:1) = WS-CHAR THEN
              ADD 1 TO CONDITIONS-MET
           END-IF.
           IF CONDITIONS-MET = 1 THEN
              ADD 1 TO CORRECT-ROWS
           END-IF.

input_files.content:
1-3 a: abcde
1-3 b: cdefg
2-9 c: ccccccccc
5-11 t: sthpwtotzss
3-6 s: ssdsssss
1-13 w: wwwwwwwwwwwww
4-7 k: kkkxkkkk
2-4 r: rrkr
6-8 m: mmmmmmmm
3-5 x: xxxxy
